description:
A flashback to the younger days of Luffy and Ace reveals their unusual upbringing under the not-so-watchful eye of villainous mountain bandits!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy and Ace! The Story of How the Brothers Met!
Luffy et Ace. L`histoire d`une rencontre entre deux frères !
Luffy to Ace: Kyoudai no Deai no Monogatari!
Луффи и Эйс – история встречи братьев!
لوفي وإيس! قصّة كيف التقى الأخوان!
ルフィとエース 兄弟の出会いの物語!
